title: The Unlucky country
creator_credit: Don Murray, Denys Brown and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: South Vietnam, a developing country facing the process of improving standards of living, health and education, against a background of constant dissension and war - the dual objectives to win a war and develop a country. Discusses the role of Australian Task Forces in establishing security and providing aid for civil development. Shows the work of the three medical teams.
